Posts.Content: Dec 3, 2007 10:19PM traci_t wrote: Hi everyone, Thank you all for your resassurance.  Biopsy is over.  I had it 2 hours ago, guess it wasnt toooo bad, but stinging quite a bit now. I had a breast guy do it and he saw I was upset and teriffied and it was all over in about 15 minutes.  He said to him it looks like its highly unlikely to be anything nasty but I will be nervous until I hear the news on Friday.  Well hopefully Friday, I have an appointment with the breast surgeon on Friday, but they said it could take 5 days to come back from pathology.  I will try not to get myself to worked up between now and then. Thank you again, my thoughts and prayers are with everyone. Traci.
Posts.Title: Scared of Biopsy traci_t wvgirl

Posts.Content: traci_t wrote: Hello everyone, I am new to this forum.  Went for an ultrasound 3 mths ago due to finding a small lump in my breast.  The breast surgeon said it looked like nothing to worry about and that it was fluid that would settle and to go back in a few months time for another follow up ultrasound.  Well I have done that and went back to see the breast surgeon today, the original lump is gone, but they have found another one - non palapable and now I need to have a biopsy done.  They will do a fine needle aspiration first and if they need to they will then do a core biopsy.  I'm terrified of needles, how much does this procedure hurt?  Scared of the result too, but am just taking it one step at a time.  I am 38 yrs old, what are the odds of this being cancer?  Do they give you a local anasthetic for the biopsy?  How long will it take???  Sorry for so many questions, just feeling rather nervous. Thanks, Traci. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Scared of Biopsy traci_t wvgirl

Posts.Content: Dec 7, 2007 12:22AM traci_t wrote: Good Results today, thank goodness.  No cancer, totally normal breast tissue, no follow up appointments needed.  Its totally all over thank goodness...  Now I can get back to looking after and worrying about my sick hubby (been chronically ill with weird CFS like symptoms for 2 years). Thanks for your reassurances and good luck to everyone. Traci -xx-
Posts.Title: Scared of Biopsy traci_t wvgirl
